About Me

I am a dedicated DevSecOps professional and Systems Engineer with deep expertise in cloud technologies and microservices architecture. My passion lies in transforming infrastructures and implementing secure, efficient software development life cycles that drive innovation and excellence in software engineering. I specialize in AWS, Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, and Java, leveraging these tools to create scalable and reliable systems. \n With multiple certifications, including AWS Certified Developer Associate, CKAD, and HashiCorp Vault, I am committed to staying at the forefront of the industry. I excel at optimizing application performance and security, delivering high-quality solutions that solve complex challenges. Fluent in both Spanish and English, I thrive on continuous learning and exploring new technologies to enhance my skills and knowledge. \nThroughout my career, I’ve been driven by a genuine love for technology and its potential to transform the world. My goal is to bring innovation and excellence to every project I work on, always seeking to solve complex challenges with robust and efficient solutions. I am passionate about advancing the field of DevSecOps, staying updated with the latest industry trends, and contributing to the tech community.
